1. How does our trip collect and use your personal information

Personal information refers to a variety of information that can identify specific natural persons or reflects the activity of specific natural persons in a single or other information with other information.

Personal information includes names, birthdays, ID numbers, personal biometric information, communication and communication contact information, address, account information, property status, trajectory trajectory, etc.
